Dear [FULLNAME],

Welcome to [SITEALIAS], your new trusted SSL partner!

Please keep this email for your records.
Your [SITEALIAS] Client ID is [CLIENTID]

Click below link to login:

--------------------------

Thank you for choosing [SITEALIAS]. We appreciate your business.

If you have any more questions regarding your account, please feel free to reach us via Live Chat or email support.

 

Thanks,

Sales Team
[SITEALIAS]

EmailTemplate.EmailSubject: Your Reseller account has been activated
EmailTemplate.EmailContent:
Dear [FULLNAME],

Congratulations! You are now ready to process your SSL orders and manage them easily. First you have to fund your account with a minimum of $100 USD or more depending on your needs. Don’t worry, this credit is your money and will be used to process your orders. Every time you purchase a certificate it will be deducted from your credit balance.

In the event your credit is exhausted, you will have to replenish your account. You must have a credit balance in order to make purchases.

Reseller prices are based on the volume of purchase. The higher the purchase level, the cheaper the price. Detailed pricing can be found in our website. To qualify for a lower pricing level, you either have to purchase the actual amount or deposit the amount that level requires.

For example: If you would like to qualify for the $1000 or SILVER level, simply deposit $1000 and you can start taking advantage of that price level immediately. Alternatively, you can keep buying your certificates at the lowest level until you have accumulated the next level’s needed amount of purchases. Once your account reaches the next threshold, it automatically lowers your prices.

If you are switching to [SITEALIAS] from another SSL provider, simply show us the receipts of the purchases you have made and we will grant that level to you. Let’s say you had been a direct reseller of GeoTrust, VeriSign or another Partner and bought $10,000 in the past. With the proof of purchase you immediately qualify for $10,000 pricing level. Please contact us immediately.

Please keep this email for your records. Your account information is as follows:

--------------------------
Your TheSSLStore.com Reseller IDs: [CLIENTID]
Login at: [LOGINLINK]
--------------------------

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us via Live Chat
Once again, welcome to [SITEALIAS].

Sincerely,
[SITEALIAS] Team

Hello Support,

Transaction [TRANSACTIONID] has been marked for fraud detection.

To view this transaction, click on the Fraud Detection Suite in the Merchant Interface main menu. In the Transaction Filters section, click on the number to the right of any of the filters listed above, then click on transaction ID [TRANSACTIONID].


You can also perform a search for the transaction using the transaction ID listed above.


Please Approve/Reject Pending Order in the “Admin” section of [SITEALIAS].

 

Thanks,

Support Team

EmailTemplate.EmailSubject: Expiration Notice. Renew now to continue securing your website.
EmailTemplate.EmailContent:
Dear [FULLNAME],

Your SSL certificate for [DOMAINNAME] will expire on [DATEOFEXPIRE].  You must renew your [PRODUCTNAME] SSL certificate by [DATEOFEXPIRE] in order to continue securing your website.

Please follow this link to renew your certificate [ADDTOCARTURL]. If you don’t remember your password, click on forgot password and enter your email address. The system will send you a link to reset your password.

Again, thank you for being a loyal customer.  If you need assistance or have a question, you can reach us through our website via live chat, or call us at: [CONTECTNUMBER].

You can unsubscribe to renewals for this certificate in your account, through My Orders »»» Order Details. Please note that the renewals reduce both pricing and the chance of a lapse in SSL coverage. [LOGINURL]

Note: If you have already ordered your SSL certificate from [SITEURL], then please ignore this message.

Best Regards,

[SITEALIAS]

Expiring certificate list is available in your Partner Control panel under “Account Summary”.

EmailTemplate.EmailSubject: Your Security certificate for [DOMAINNAME] will expire in 30 days
EmailTemplate.EmailContent:
Dear [CUSTOMERFULLNAME],

Your SSL certificate for [DOMAINNAME] will expire on [DATEOFEXPIRE].  You must renew your [PRODUCTNAME] SSL certificate by [DATEOFEXPIRE] in order to continue securing your website.

Please contact [RESELLERCOMPANYNAME] at your earliest convenience to renew your certificate..

Again, thank you for being a loyal customer.  If you need assistance or have a question, please call us at: [RESELLERPHONE].

Note: If you have already ordered your SSL certificate,then please ignore this message.

Best Regards,

[RESELLERCOMPANYNAME]

[RESELLEREMAIL]

[RESELLERPHONE]
